description:
As a user of the appeal service
  I need to be informed of cookies and the impact of javascript
  So that I can enable the cookies if I want to
name: Cookie Consent - View Preferences without JavaScript enabled

elements.name: Make the content of the Cookie preference page specific to the use of Javascript when the user has Javascript turned off

steps.name: a user has elected to manage their cookie preference without JavaScript enabled
the user views the Cookie Preferences service page
the page content will mention about cookies requiring Javascript to be turned on
